H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H7637.def: = state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
